description: Standardized zone categories for routine templates and soul scheduling. All locations are mapped to one of these zones.

home_zone.description: Personal living spaces: apartments, residences, where souls rest and invite trusted Linkers.

work_zone.description: Professional and commercial environments: offices, malls, corporate districts.

entertainment_zone.description: High-energy fun and leisure: arcades, racetracks, arenas.

relaxation_zone.description: Calm and restorative locations: gardens, parks, spas, overlooks, lounges.

dining_zone.description: Casual and upscale eating/drinking spots: diners, restaurants.

nightlife_zone.description: Evening and late-night party scenes: clubs, bars.

cultural_zone.description: Intellectual, artistic, and contemplative spaces: libraries, archives, planetariums.

sports_zone.description: Physical training and competition areas: gyms, proving grounds.

underground_zone.description: Hidden, risky, or shadowy areas: markets, bridges, exchanges.

public_square_zone.description: Busy open public areas: plazas, streets.
